parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Identity

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets person's facial expression. To set it back to default, use "".
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Prior to Arma 3 v2.01.146630 Mimics must be written in all lower case letters.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[setMimic]] mimic

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mimic: [[String]] - can be one of:
{<template><title>!</title></template>
! style="padding-right: 2em" <template><title>!</title></template> Before Arma 2 OA v1.6x !! style="font-size: small" <template><title>!</title></template> Since Arma 2 OA v1.6x
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style="vertical-align: top" <template><title>!</title></template>
* "Default"
* "Normal"
* "Smile"
* "Hurt"
* "Ironic"
* "Sad"
* "Cynic"
* "Surprised"
* <template><title>sic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"Agresive"</value></part></template>
* "Angry"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style="vertical-align: top" <template><title>!</title></template>
* "neutral"
* "dead"
* "danger"
* "hurt"
* "aware"
* "safe"
* "combat"
* "unconscious"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier1 [[setMimic]] "hurt";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setIdentity]], [[setFace]], [[setFaceAnimation]], [[enableMimics]], [[setRandomLip]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Jan 19, 2010 - 15:30 (CEST)</dd>

<dd class="note">Not working in '''Arma 2 1.05'''.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
